===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[audience]]; [[spectators]]
#: {{zh-x|一 位 觀眾|''a member of the '''audience'''''}}

====Usage notes====
{{zh-l|觀眾|tr=guānzhòng}} and {{zh-l|聽眾}} are different; {{zh-l|觀眾|tr=guānzhòng}} refers to an audience which is directly watching a public event, such as spectators at a stadium, while {{zh-l|聽眾}} refers to a listening audience, such as a group of radio listeners.
